prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a blue and white color scheme and a penguin-like appearance.
Design a Pokemon resembling a bird with unique fins and a charming personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that swims gracefully through the ocean, showcasing vibrant colors and a sleek shape.
Generate a Pokemon that has a playful demeanor, with aquatic features and striking blue hues.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of icy waters, with a rounded body and a curious expression.
Make a Pokemon that can blend into both sea and land environments, featuring distinctive markings.
Give me a starter Pokemon that evolves into a majestic creature, with a unique color palette.
